rev.comment: alright, the continuity is made, and the mention will remain. addition of "under Stalinist leadership," since the nature of Leninist and Stalinist leadership was markedly different.
/* Head of the Soviet state */ reÃ¶ations to the Gulags should be mentioned
we need some other wikipedians here to establish some continuity. i'm trying!
a fair mention, but one should never forget context! (also, the mention of "later, these were to develop into the gulags" was misplaced and violated continuity) as well as "on imperialism"
/* Head of the Soviet state */ Obviosuly we should mention the development of the camps into the Gulags and the prior Katorgas
a relevant source on the Bolshevik argument explaining the execution of the tsar and his family
The Red Terror wasn't simply the result of an assassination attempt on Lenin's life. Many more factors abounded.
I agree, but one should mention the reason for their creation, and under whose direction it developed INTO the KGB.
/* Head of the Soviet state */ On imperialism
I applaud your stubborness. With that said: Wikipedia is not a soapbox. Do not add templates without concensus.
